website_summaries.verdict: With the exception of a cast change, The Lost Legacy ultimately delivers more of the same for Uncharted fans.
pros: Uncharted: The Lost Legacy is a meaty, satisfying expansion to the Uncharted canon that delivers another highly-produced title
It features a welcome change of personnel that provides new perspectives from characters in the franchise and it's priced right at $40 (roughly £30 or AU$50)
cons: Uncharted fans may suffer from a bit of overkill, as there's not much difference in terms of gameplay that would separate it from other games in the series

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so should you
customer_reviews.text: Depending how you play I played it on three days and beat the game kinda short but it’s pretty worth it to be honest. I never even knew naughty dogs came out with this till awhile ago when I actually saw. Bought it played it and to be honest wish there is more uncharted series to come in the future lol. Loved the story since it focused on the two other characters in the series. Honestly if you never played the lost legacy I’d actually give it a try. After I played this it made me wanna replay the whole entire uncharted series all over again.
customer_reviews.author: SlumDiggity

customer_reviews.title: Uncharted just gets better and better.
customer_reviews.text: I've played all the Uncharted games and this is my favorite one. I played it on a ps4 slim and thought it still looked better than Uncharted 4. It took me 9.5 hours to play all the way through on normal dificulty. There are no super natural happenings or trippy effects in this one. Just some straight forward fortune hunting, puzzle solving and intense gun battles with a Warlord and his private army. Hopefully Naughty Dog continues making the Uncharted series as I've really enjoyed each game.
customer_reviews.author: A. S.

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome game. No surprises here - it is exactly ...
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome game. No surprises here - it is exactly what you expect from an Uncharted Series of games, you are just playing as a character other than Nathan Drake. The game play, graphics, etc. are all similar to Uncharted 4: This game was originally conceived as DLC for Uncharted 4, and then was expanded to an entire game. The single player campaign is great, I have not played the multiple player (I am not really interested in multiplayer for any of these games, so cant comment there). There is a chapter in the middle of the game that provides a new free-roam aspect to the Uncharted series. Very cool
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Banks

customer_reviews.title: He really liked the game but the only thing is that the ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a xmas gift for my husband. He really liked the game but the only thing is that the game is a bit on the short side. My husband doesn't play games all that much - maybe an hour at a time and only 3-4 times a week at the most however he finished this game in less than a month. He has another game that he's received for xmas and is still playing and has a long way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Uncharted 4...except with female leads.
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of the Uncharted series since the very first one, and while I still liked TLL, very little has changed since Uncharted 4. The major difference is that instead of playing as Drake, you play as Chloe with Nadine as a computer controlled tagalong. Very little if anything changed with the controller layout. The action and graphics are just as spectacular as Uncharted 4 as well as the scripting and voice over acting. If the ending is an indicator, and I believe it is, the series will continue with these main characters. It remains to be seen if I will get as excited about them as I did Drake.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jacks

customer_reviews.title: definitely a fan of this one
customer_reviews.text: this game is so much fun. i went in with a little bit of skepticism since this is the first uncharted game i will have played without nathan drake. i honestly didn't know if it would work. but it did...and well. i had a LOT of fun playing this game through...several times. the scenery, the dialog, and the gameplay are all top notch (in my opinion). i would highly recommend this to anyone who is a fan of the uncharted series.
customer_reviews.author: sk33tr

customer_reviews.title: Fun adventure, entertaining heroines
customer_reviews.text: I played this with my boys watching and we all had a great time. When describing it to my wife the said "we" were swinging and hanging and climbing and punching and shooting, so they really got into the adventure. The main characters are entertaining to spend time with, especially their banter. I usually enjoy a good female lead (fem-Shep is the best way to play Mass Effect) and this was no exception. Watching Chloe and Nadine lay the snack down on the bad guy was fun.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rehm

customer_reviews.title: Naughty Dog doesn't disappoint! Hands down my favorite installment of the Uncharted series.
customer_reviews.text: This game is outstanding - gorgeous visuals, solid storytelling, and stellar performances from Claudia Black and Laura Bailey. I love Nathan Drake, but I've been aching to see the kickass ladies in this series get their time to shine, and Naughty Dog delivers!
customer_reviews.author: Shrimp! Heaven! Now!

customer_reviews.title: Short, Sweet, and Extremely Enjoyable!
customer_reviews.text: Short, Sweet and Extremely enjoyable! I think it is the shortest game (10 hours) that I have ever played, but it is so well done! Some games you spend months in (in real time) and while it isn’t the case for ALL games, some can get boring/repetitive/meh... not this one. It is a story, it follows the plot, it isn’t stupid or silly. I also happen to be a YUGE Claudia Black fan, and the graphics/gameplay are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Dianna A.

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I finally got around to playing the Uncharted series and decided to pick this up when it went on sale for $10. Chloe was one of my favorite characters so that was a big draw for me. The game was fun and a bit shorter than the previous entries which was expected. If you like Uncharted you'll like this game. Solid 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Quite good! Chloe and Nadine are an interesting team
customer_reviews.text: Quite good! Chloe and Nadine are an interesting team, and it's about time the series features a lead female protagonist. The game's not quite as long or explosive as Uncharted 4, but overall it's excellent and the length is appropriate to the price. Would recommend if you liked Uncharted 4 and are looking for more content.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I did not like the Beginning. It is progressing towards a better Rating
customer_reviews.text: I have only just started. The way it starts is Bad, almost Gave it to the never see Again Pile. Where is Nasty Nate? When does He Get Back Home to Save These girlies afraid to Shoot someone? Nate Shoot em' UP!!! NO Such Thing As Sensesless Violence. Matter of Your Point of View.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Ray

customer_reviews.title: One of My Favorite Uncharted Games
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this particular game because, even though I'm not a huge fan of the Uncharted series it's made by NaughtyDog and for those of you who may know or may not know, they also made Jak and Daxter along with other great titles. I bought Uncharted Lost Legacy because of its plot, the storyline (which I felt like could've been done slightly better and a bit longer) still, a good game and consisting of two tough women who know how to handle their own. I've played the first Uncharted and I have to say, I already favor this one over that. Drake's cool but Chloe and Nadine make one heck of a team.
customer_reviews.author: Dommy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Game.
customer_reviews.text: I've never played a bad Uncharted Game. I have all of them in the series and this one is worth the price to own. An action packed roller-coaster ride with puzzles. Just when you think the game will get boring it picks right back up and sucks you back into the story. I enjoyed playing this and if I didn't have such a long list of stuff on my playlist already I would give this another play-thru.
customer_reviews.author: Qzack

customer_reviews.title: Fun game and an interesting variation on the series
customer_reviews.text: Fun game and an interesting variation on the series. Instead of Nathan Drake as the lead character, you get one of his former enemies (the evil Nadine) and an old flame of Nathan's, Chloe I think her name is. In the solo campaign, you play as Chloe and I don't think there is an option to be Nadine, but I might be wrong. If I had a complaint, the game is shorter than the previous Uncharted games, but it was also less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Hubie

customer_reviews.title: Nothing new, really.
customer_reviews.text: Story mode was fairly short and too much drama. I felt like this game was rushed and put out on the market! Hopefully ( if they plan on it), making the next installment will not look so much like Uncharted 4 and use their installment with a new places to see. Unfortunately, i felt i was playing Uncharted 4 minus a lot of characters. Same visuals, same jeep, same train scene, helicopters, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bratek

customer_reviews.title: Really nice followup to UC4
customer_reviews.text: Really nice followup to UC4. The gameplay is very similar, but with a few well executed add-ons (e.g., lock picking) that add little wrinkles to strategy. And as always, Naughty Dog's level of polish is near perfect, as well as their writing and character development. It's not a full scale game by any means, but it's worth playing if you miss the series.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great!!! Get this if you love everything Uncharted.
customer_reviews.text: It's more of the same Uncharted that we enjoy and love. Also nice to see them actually stick to one country for a change, though some of the 'localization' is incorrect. Hindi speaking mercenaries in Tamil neighborhoods? Vast stone sculptures no one has ever laid eyes upon in India?
customer_reviews.author: absessive

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved this game
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this game! I'm a huge fan of the Uncharted Series and hope the rumors of this great series of a game does not come to an end, but if the rumors are true then this was a great way to go out. Game story is very exciting, lots of places to explore and plenty of challenging puzzles to keep to interested and thinking about solutions. I highly recommend this game to anyone that loves a great game or that love the Uncharted Series or any modern Tomb Raider game as these two series are a lot closer to each other than one may think as far as stories, ancient lost cities/tombs, mysteries, and challenging puzzles go.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Espinal

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fun game but very short. I wish they could make it longer and more intense. Finished the game in 3 evenings, didn’t even pull the disk out. The value on these games is dropping like a stone. :( Maybe renting it for a weekend will be a better idea.
customer_reviews.author: LoLa

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband. He beat the game in a week or two. I also enjoyed watching him play. The graphics are good. The story line is alright. It has a bit of action and interesting visuals/game play. It’s worth a gander if you enjoy the ‘Uncharted’ series.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Yo Dawg...
customer_reviews.text: If you like Uncharted's platform, puzzle solve, shoot, have your treasure you've slaved over for the last 20 minutes stolen from you by someone with more guns formula, you'll love this game. It's certainly the best of all of them. Uncharted is VERY repetitive and linear.
customer_reviews.author: Hector L.

customer_reviews.title: Deserves more credit...great game
customer_reviews.text: This game does not get the credit it deserves. Story, graphics and gameplay are all top notch. It is shorter at about 8 or so hours, but for $19, you get your money's worth. If this where not in the shadow of uncharted 4, it would have received higher marks. Great game! If you are into uncharted, get this game.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Rich

customer_reviews.title: DIDN'T RECIEVE WHAT I WANTED... EXACTLY
customer_reviews.text: stream Lee disappointed... I ordered this because it didn't have the greatest hits on it... Did not want the one with the greatest hits wanted the original cover as it was in the photo... Disappointed but I guess I'll keep it instead of returning it
customer_reviews.author: MovieGamer&GiftGod

customer_reviews.title: Drake who?
customer_reviews.text: Naughty Dog one of my favorite game studios and has been since I played Uncharted 2 on the ps3. This is a greet game with 2 female leads, a little bit shorter than the usual Uncharted game but the story is good and it has multiplayer and Survival mode just like Uncharted 4 and is compatible to play multiplayer or online with Uncharted 4. I only wish the game gave you the option to play as either Chloe or Nadine.
customer_reviews.author: Chas Dehvul

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great game, missing the humor though.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty fun and interesting, the dialog leaves a bit to be desired. While obviously it wont have Nathan Drake's sarcastic and funny tone, the new main character seems to try and take on the persona of Sarcastic wise cracking explorer and it only makes long time fans miss Nathan and Sully that much more. Overall a good addition to any Uncharted Fan's collection, but Chloe could have used her own personality.
customer_reviews.author: Paix

customer_reviews.title: This game is fun. It can be more of the same
customer_reviews.text: This game is fun. It can be more of the same, but when the "same" is a high quality game that defines the playstation, I will take it. It is about a 6-10 hour game, depending on your play style and exploration. It has treasures and trophies like other uncharted games that make it replayable. Story is like that of any other uncharted, it sucks you in and has great moments. Overall it is a fantastic addition.
customer_reviews.author: amazingspiderman

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I loved this game!! Now I’m not gonna lie, I did initially bought this game because of the two ladies on the cover, and being able to play as them. As a girl, it’s a bit hard to find good action packed games with such great imagery and storyline that is centered around solely girls. So once I saw this I grabbed it, and fell in love. And if your not really a gamer they have an adventure mode where you don’t die, and just keep coming back to the scene until you beat the game. I just ordered the original Uncharted and can’t wait to play. A great but at a awesome price!
customer_reviews.author: M.A.E

customer_reviews.title: Very good/borderline great game and easily worth the $20 I paid for it!
customer_reviews.text: Just beat it...it was a very good/borderline great game and easily worth the $20 I paid for it. If you're a fan of the Uncharted series, you're bound to enjoy this game. There is some repetitiveness, but the action set pieces and absolutely lush environments more than make up for it!
customer_reviews.author: RageATL

customer_reviews.title: Breathtaking!
customer_reviews.text: I love the whole Uncharted series! Naughty Dog has done it again, the graphics is breathtaking and unbelievable! The way the characters look, the ripples in the water, the wind blowing across the trees, is all amazing! The challenges in each level is challenging but not to a point where you wanna give up and not play the game. I will always be a Uncharted fan!
customer_reviews.author: Uniquely Asian

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend loved this! Exceeded his expectations
customer_reviews.text: This game is amazing and it is an absolute must if you played any of the other uncharted games. Shout out to amazon for supplying the game and the code for J&D for the cheapest price. I was worried since i was getting the gamr at such a discount (20% off plus free shipping) we would be loosing out on the digital code for jak and daxter but thankfully that wasnt the case! So pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: NaugthyDog did it again...
customer_reviews.text: ...this game is absolutly worth it. On my first playthrough I was expecting the game to end after a few hours. But it kept on going longer then expected. Planed as a DLC-type experience, NaughtyDog made a fully loaded Uncharted game. No doubt, NaughtyDog is one of the best developer studio these days. Story, grafic, sound und gameplay make this game an absolute 10 and a must play for Uncharted fans. Even though you miss Drake in the beginning of an game that feels so “Uncharted”, you will love this game. And will be highly rewarded in the unexpected end.
customer_reviews.author: Peter G.

customer_reviews.title: Four but not Five
customer_reviews.text: It is a very short story, linear and devout of many side stories and missions. The characters are interesting and the personalities develop throughout the story. It would have been better to add a flashback story to augment the personality of Chloe or Nadine. This would have provided more background on the main characters (e.g., shoreline). The graphics are good but not amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard K

customer_reviews.title: The Hobbs and Shaw of Uncharted
customer_reviews.text: Good game technically. Works well and pretty to look at. The characters just don’t have the charm and heart of Nathan Drake, and the story is less cinematic (a feature I loved from the original uncharted games) But decent overall and a good game for the price I paid (got it on a coupon deal)
customer_reviews.author: TwinsFan87

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the time or money
customer_reviews.text: Similar to prior uncharted games in the way it handles and gameplay nothing new has been added very average storyline One thing that is missing is the humor from the previous games I would not recommend this game unless you can get it at a low price
customer_reviews.author: Palmbch

customer_reviews.title: A good game, lots of content to enjoy
customer_reviews.text: If you played Uncharted 4, this is just more of it. If you love Uncharted 4 or the series in general, this is a must buy. The story is not focus on the usual main character, Nathan Drake, but the new cast is just as charismatic. The game is very over the top and a good ride, it just requires that you suspend your disbelief in a couple of moments. Gameplay is crisps, writing is top notch as expected from Naughty Dog. If you have a PlayStation and looking for a 8 - 10 hours experience, this is one that I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Son Tran

customer_reviews.title: Don't play close to bedtime, otherwise this is a fabulous game to play all day long.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of action and also exploration. Magnificent scenery that will captivate and enthrall you! Only problem, if you play closer to bedtime than 1 hr, the adrenalin needed to play the game will interfere with sleepiness.
customer_reviews.author: Casual Kaz

customer_reviews.title: Boring
customer_reviews.text: Kinda slow too much story line not enough action game play
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Rated "M" stands for Middle school aged. Right?
customer_reviews.text: *spoilers* Got as a xmas gift for an 11yo. (Go figgure). The two ladies on the cover ARE actually lovers in the game. Things in game got pretty steamy. Some how I think he knew that. This game goes in Daddys off limits collection now.
customer_reviews.author: Brody's Arts & Crafts LLC

customer_reviews.title: Naughty Dog does it again
customer_reviews.text: The Uncharted series is a masterpiece and I don't use this term lightly. While this is fairly shorter than Uncharted 4, it's just as intense, fun, and gripping. The cutscenes are engaging, the graphics and locals are gorgeous, the character body movements and facial features are absolutely believable, the hilarious and clever banter is still there, and the combat is still challenging. This is a must have for any PS4 owner who loves action/adventure games.
customer_reviews.author: Maul Scarreign

customer_reviews.title: The best of the Uncharted Saga - Beautifully crafted
customer_reviews.text: One of the best game I ever played with engaging story and characters. I enjoyed this game far more than the Tomb Raider series of games. The voice acting in the game brings the characters alive in a beautifully crafted world with Indian mythologies. Wish there will be a follow up!
customer_reviews.author: GadgeTron

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as any of its predecessors
customer_reviews.text: OK, but a little disappointing. Not up to the standard of the previous Uncharted games in my opinion, and it seemed rather short as well - I got to the end and was surprised - "That's it ??"
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: For me that's a great thing, but i know that isn't the case ...
customer_reviews.text: Make no mistake this is more Uncharted. For me that's a great thing, but i know that isn't the case for everyone. It felt like a greatest hits compilation combining the type of set pieces found in different entries of the series. The performances are spectacular and the best in the industry, like all things Naughty Dog of the last ten years. This is proof the franchise can continue without Nathan. Chloe and Nadine were strong enough characters to carry this game, and I look forward to the future possibilities of this franchise.
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: nice addition to series
customer_reviews.text: Didnt dig playin a chic as i am a dude. However the game rocks mostly, and added more scenes where sneaking around is useful. The hand to hand vs bosses was lame as it was mostly dodge/counter punch. Too much girl talk cut scenes also. Overall i enjoyed it, but wont play it as repeatedly as i do with the rest of the series. Completed all difficulty levels.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Rey

customer_reviews.title: My Most Favorite Uncharted
customer_reviews.text: Feels so good to finally have all the Uncharted games. Missed seeing Nate though. The Lost Legacy is my most favorite. Chloe is gorgeous, the story is exciting and the graphics... the graphics is incredible! Highly recommend for those who are seeking out an exciting story. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: HaHaNo

customer_reviews.title: A fun and gorgeous expansion to Uncharted 4, just not quite as compelling
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as compelling as Uncharted 4, but still very good, and just incredibly gorgeous. This game is also way bigger than I expected. You will get your money's worth. TheLos Legacy is set in India, starring two of Uncharted's favorite supporting characters, Chloe and Nadine. The game relies on pretty much the same gameplay elements that you have come to know in Uncharted, but there are some awesome open environments and throwback set-piece moments.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Great game of you like the Uncharted series of games.
customer_reviews.author: Rick H. Bomar

customer_reviews.title: One of the best games I've ever played and my favorite Uncharted game ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the best games I've ever played and my favorite Uncharted game by far! The characters are awesome and their are so many great moments. Also, the puzzles/challenges were better than the new Tomb Raider games (which are good too).
customer_reviews.author: Rey Fan

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my husband for his birthday and he loved it! I don't play video games
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for his birthday and he loved it! I don't play video games, but I enjoyed watching him play. The graphics were so real and the storyline kept me interested, I felt like I was watching a movie. Couldn't wait until he would play again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: If you love the series, this is a good buy because it gives you more information and backstory on the characters. Gameplay is and graphics are just as good as the other games too. Only downside is I do feel it was shorter than the others. I played it for about maybe 15 hours and beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game and beautiful grafics
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome game if you love the uncharted series, this game will show you amazing grafics. I was very surprised about this game I recommend to buy it it's worth it
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Damn good Game
customer_reviews.text: It was an interesting play with real replay value because there are some bonus modes available after finishing single player.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: I honestly think this is one of the better uncharted games
customer_reviews.text: I honestly think this is one of the better uncharted games. The story is right up there. Gameplay is top notch. And good lord is it pretty, graphics have come such a long way. I barely noticed that it was shorter than a regular title. I really hope they continue these games.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: More of the same, but worth a play through
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty entertaining game and there were some fantastic visuals and cut scenes. If you like other games in the Uncharted series, then I think you'll have a great time playing this through. There is some collecting to be done, but limited replay value other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Millertime

customer_reviews.title: A must have for PS4 owners!
customer_reviews.text: Great game at a great price! I’m an old school single playing fool. This game has great voice acting and a pretty good story. It gets a little supermanish or should I say supergirlish, but for a chick flick I enjoyed almost as good as Uncharted 4. A must buy title for PS4 owners.
customer_reviews.author: BASHEM72

customer_reviews.title: Move over Nathan Drake!
customer_reviews.text: The Uncharted series continues to add to its legacy. A great narrative, stunning visuals, and two protagonists hard not to fall in love with! Naughty dog has done it once again, and continues to blur the lines between movies and gaming. Though it is a spinoff of the original series, Chloe and Nadine both show a refreshing side worthy of their own sequels!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Always an entertaining series of games.
customer_reviews.text: Love all the Uncharted games, but this one was not as challenging as the previous edition. Still fun all around and the graphics are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Near perfect game
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to say that I hope Naughty Dog follows this game up with another full blown sequel. It has all the strengths of the previous Uncharted games, but the depth of the characters/storytelling has advanced beyond the original Uncharted games. A+ voice acting from Claudia Black and Laura Bailey make this game near perfect except it is a little on the short side. More please.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this latest installation of the Naughty Dog series. Each one improves upon the last. Please keep them coming, forever :-)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. English

customer_reviews.title: Too short, but loved every bit of it.
customer_reviews.text: Great game! I beat it in 8 days, I wish there was more ☹ The graphics are beautiful and puzzles are fairly easy. I hope they continue making more games
customer_reviews.author: Michael Keys

customer_reviews.title: Another great edition to the Uncharted Series
customer_reviews.text: Great game, true to what we've come to expect from the uncharted series. Beat it in 8 hours. Still playing through looking for all treasures and playing multiplayer first person shooter online.
customer_reviews.author: David Cummiskey

customer_reviews.title: Great follow up
customer_reviews.text: Familiar characters, but a great story and high action. The game is short and sweet. Same great graphics as the originals and follows the Uncharted 4 format as far as game play. I hope they make more.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Smith

customer_reviews.title: No Nate...but Still Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great game...! If you like the Uncharted Series with Nate, Sully, and crew, then this is a solid farewell (never say never) to the franchise. Its the same formula as the first four games, but with girl power as the headliner. I enjoyed playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Outlaw31

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the time
customer_reviews.text: Just like Uncharted 4, great story and dialogue. Care about these characters more than any in most movies! Kind of short compared to Uncharted 4 but I kind of expected that. Hope there are more stand-alones in the future.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Story, As Always
customer_reviews.text: I am a bit of a Naughty Dog nut, so I am probably biased - but this was an excellent game! Fair price for what ended up being almost 8 hours for the campaign. Naughty Dog certainly knows how to tell their stories!!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: A concise action adventure for Uncharted fans!
customer_reviews.text: Lost Legacy is at it's core an Uncharted game that will delight fans of the previous installments in the series. Its focus on a different set of established characters and their storylines makes it fresh and it's shortened playtime is well paced without overstaying it's welcome or feeling too padded. This is a detriment that many thought Uncharted 4 suffered from. Naughty Dog has proven once again that they are the kings of third-person story based action games.
customer_reviews.author: joseph bell

customer_reviews.title: Great expansion
customer_reviews.text: Feels like an expansion and it's more of an open world game than Uncharted 4. It's a fun game
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Moreno

customer_reviews.title: great game I play on easy mode--fun to play -good ...
customer_reviews.text: great game I play on easy mode--fun to play -good story line-loved the banter between chloe and Nadine-great graphics-the mechanics could have been better with the controller-love the hint factor--used it several times--keep up the great work naughty dog--but also bring back Nate and Elena--Chloe and Nadine rock.
customer_reviews.author: intel review

customer_reviews.title: When you see Naughty Dog on the box, you know its a 5/5
customer_reviews.text: This game was awesome as expected. That sounds strange to say because most of the time you pre-order a game, you're expectations are NOT met. Another fun, over the top action adventure from the best developer in the industry.
customer_reviews.author: Linus C Minus

customer_reviews.title: It's a good game. 3 stars for me
customer_reviews.text: It's a good game. 3 stars for me. Most of the game is in the same environment. It's much shorter then the other Uncharted games. The same amazing visuals and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Z

customer_reviews.title: Play it before it becomes your lost legacy.
customer_reviews.text: Uncharted has always been one of my favorite game series and loved it even more because of the length of the game. The length of the game is smaller than the previous versions but the story line is to the point with breath taking graphics.
customer_reviews.author: Jayam

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the Uncharted Series
customer_reviews.text: Fun game. Great additional side story to the Uncharted Series. This game did not disappoint. Hope they make a full new series on Nathan's daughter continuing his legacy. I think that would be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Hum77

customer_reviews.title: I strongly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I love the series of these games. This particular game is extremely cool but it's a shame that it is very short. I finished it in two days. Too bad they did not make it more sophisticated although I strongly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Moshe Yaniv Chupak

customer_reviews.title: Excellent game!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game, great action, outstanding voice acting, interesting story and one of the most beautiful games I've played. Don't believe IGN's review. This game deserves at least 9.5 or higher. It's also a full game for half the price. It took me 10.5 hours to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

customer_reviews.title: Don't break the product.
customer_reviews.text: bought this along with the Nathan drake collection, both products arrived early; which is good. But both arrived damaged, luckily the lost legacy works. But the Nathan Drake collection, the disc was badly damaged so it doesn't work. I'm not a prude when it comes to a busted up box, but if i can't play the actual game, that's when we have a problem. Get your life together amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Pluto

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you liked either of these ladies in the previous uncharted games, then you will love this game. Super action packed and full of beautiful scenery!
customer_reviews.author: Jasen

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: I like all the uncharted games I hope they will continue it
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Webb

customer_reviews.title: Games easily finished
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old son beats these games within a couple of hours, and usually doesn’t bother playing again. I recommend that if your teenager likes this kind of game, 20 bucks spent and gone. I just don’t let my son purchase games that he will beat and be done ✅
customer_reviews.author: Antonia K. Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Didn't last long enough. Wish it went on & on.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Craine

customer_reviews.title: Great game overall!
customer_reviews.text: Great game like the rest of Naughty Dogs games. Just like Drake’s Uncharted games but a little shorter. Good background stories with a lot of knowledge of the past. Puzzles were a bit harder than the last Uncharted game which is great. Great game over all!
customer_reviews.author: Rakino

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't miss a beat
customer_reviews.text: Coming from some one who couldn't get enough of the first four Uncharted's I was happy for this game to come out but It wasn't like I couldn't. I thought the game would feel off without Nathan but boy was I wrong this game does not miss a beat. GET THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think games like these are very good for keeping the mind young ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband really enjoys this series of games. He was very excited when it came in the mail and has been playing quite frequently. I think games like these are very good for keeping the mind young with all the puzzles.
customer_reviews.author: MMonaghan

customer_reviews.title: Disk read issues.
customer_reviews.text: Disk doesn’t read. It stops and starts and sputters. Apparently this has been a common problem that has never been once acknowledged by Sony or the developer. Can’t play it, had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ian McGowan

customer_reviews.title: A nice addition
customer_reviews.text: Love the series and was worried this would be super cheesy, not mad I played and finished it. It’s got its own unique story
customer_reviews.author: Casey Hart

customer_reviews.title: A nice supplemental game to the Uncharted series!
customer_reviews.text: A nice supplemental game to the Uncharted series. It seems a little recycled and I would like to see more geographical diversity instead of the typical jungle setting. Overall, it's a good game and absolutely worth playing!
customer_reviews.author: lilmtnwolf

customer_reviews.title: It was a very good game!
customer_reviews.text: This game is worth trying and is really fun from the start to finish with a decent story and great gameplay.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Fun short game.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice game. Shorter than a normal game, but then again, is kind of a independent DLC.
customer_reviews.author: FAMC

customer_reviews.title: Decent Adventure Game
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as previous installments, but it was a good game, I love Claudia Black's gravelly voice for voice acting. The 1st half of the game was boringish, but the action ramped up soon enough. The story was left open-ended for additional sequals.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G

customer_reviews.title: Chipped case
customer_reviews.text: While the game works and I love it, the case itself had a chip missing from it when opened which could be a shipping problem but that's just my experience still fun game.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Another perfect Uncharted game!
customer_reviews.text: This game is great! Very similar to Uncharted 4, pace is good, full of actions, great puzzles. Good storyline and interesting characters! Just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: TR FAN

customer_reviews.title: Good game but shorter than other Uncharted games.
customer_reviews.text: Game was good, Sort of like the last one Uncharted 4. Was a little disappointed that the game only had around 9-10 chapters and not 20-21 like the normal ones do. I really did enjoy the gameplay but I finished the game way too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: kassidy

customer_reviews.title: Lovely game
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a friend and they enjoyed playing through it.
customer_reviews.author: Yuki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful game, typical of the Uncharted series. Seamless transitions from cutscenes 2 gameplay, absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jason McPfusch

customer_reviews.title: I'm going to ask for directions
customer_reviews.text: Looks like this will be the last Uncharted and it is a good one. Should you love the Uncharted series or the Tomb Raider series, you will love this.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Moyses

customer_reviews.title: 2 Girls 1 Rich guy
customer_reviews.text: Loved it a lot wasnt long though that’s why price dropped after its release because gamers of the franchise couldn’t accept that
customer_reviews.author: Fezito Chancy

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: This game was a breath of fresh air away from nathen drake. The main character is actually likable and comical. Great graphics and scenery. If you like games like the tomb raider this is a good buy. Seller was on time with shipping and game was in brand new condition. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby barringer

customer_reviews.title: The game is incredible but I expected it with the ...
customer_reviews.text: The game is incredible but I expected it with the option in Spanish but the one that received it does not have it. I have researched about the game and all the comments agree that if it comes in Spanish. Then why the game sent not?
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Betancourt

customer_reviews.title: The game is great, however the version they sent me was a ...
customer_reviews.text: The game is great, however the version they sent me was a European copy (I’m in the US). This doesn’t really matter for the game as the PS4 is not region-locked, but the included codes inside the case don’t work for my region. The disc includes some DLC content as well as a downloadable game called “That’s You!” but the codes don’t work in my region which sucks
customer_reviews.author: Austin Vawter

customer_reviews.title: A blast!
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to the Uncharted series. You won’t get anything new here - the gameplay is identical to Uncharted 4 - but there are some truly breathtaking scenes, and Chloe and Nadine make for some great company over the 8-10 hours this takes to complete.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun game. Very similar to the original but a nice "expansion." Worth the money if you liked the original and want to expand game play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Uncharted: The Lost Legacy - PlayStation 4
product_meta.description: From critically acclaimed developers Naughty Dog comes the first standalone adventure in UNCHARTED franchise history led by fan-favorite character, Chloe Frazer. UNCHARTED: The Lost Legacy will come with access to UNCHARTED 4: A Thief's End Multiplayer and Survival modes. Online multiplayer on PS4 requires a PlayStation Plus membership, sold separately. Owners of UNCHARTED 4: A Thief's End Digital Deluxe Edition, UNCHARTED 4: A Thief's End Triple Pack, and UNCHARTED 4: A Thief's End Explorer's Pack will receive UNCHARTED: The Lost Legacy as a download at launch.
feature_bullets: Critically-acclaimed developer Naughty Dog's standalone Uncharted adventure starring Chloe Frazer.
Venture deep into India's Western Ghats as Chloe and Nadine recover an ancient artifact and fight their way through fierce opposition to prevent the region from falling into chaos.
UNCHARTED: The Lost Legacy will come with access to UNCHARTED 4: A Thief's End Multiplayer and Survival modes. Online multiplayer on PS4 requires a PlayStation Plus membership, sold separately.
Entertainment Software Rating Board (ESRB) Content Description: Blood, language, suggestive themes, use of alcohol and tobacco, violence
